verses.verse: The hand <WH3027> of the LORD <WH3068> was <WH1961> upon <WH5921> me, and carried me out <WH3318> in the spirit <WH7307> of the LORD, <WH3068> and set me down <WH5117> in the midst <WH8432> of the valley <WH1237> which <WH1931> was full <WH4392> of bones, <WH6106>

And caused me to pass <WH5674> by <WH5921> them round about: <WH5439> <WH5439> and, behold, <WH2009> there were very <WH3966> many <WH7227> in <WH5921> the open <WH6440> valley; <WH1237> and, lo, <WH2009> they were very <WH3966> dry. <WH3002>
And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> can these <WH428> bones <WH6106> live? <WH2421> And I answered, <WH559> O Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> thou <WH859> knowest. <WH3045>

Again he said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Prophesy <WH5012> upon <WH5921> these <WH428> bones, <WH6106> and say <WH559> unto <WH413> them, O ye dry <WH3002> bones, <WH6106> hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the LORD. <WH3068>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069> unto these <WH428> bones; <WH6106> Behold, <WH2009> I <WH589> will cause breath <WH7307> to enter <WH935> into you, and ye shall live: <WH2421>

And I will lay <WH5414> sinews <WH1517> upon <WH5921> you, and will bring up <WH5927> flesh <WH1320> upon <WH5921> you, and cover <WH7159> <WH5921> you with skin, <WH5785> and put <WH5414> breath <WH7307> in you, and ye shall live; <WH2421> and ye shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD. <WH3068>

So I prophesied <WH5012> as <WH834> I was commanded: <WH6680> and as I prophesied, <WH5012> there was <WH1961> a noise, <WH6963> and behold <WH2009> a shaking, <WH7494> and the bones <WH6106> came together, <WH7126> bone <WH6106> to <WH413> his bone. <WH6106>

And when I beheld, <WH7200> lo, <WH2009> the sinews <WH1517> and the flesh <WH1320> came up <WH5927> upon <WH5921> them, and the skin <WH5785> covered <WH7159> <WH5921> them above: <WH4605> but there was no <WH369> breath <WH7307> in them.

Then said <WH559> he unto <WH413> me, Prophesy <WH5012> unto <WH413> the wind, <WH7307> prophesy, <WH5012> son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> and say <WH559> to <WH413> the wind, <WH7307> Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Come <WH935> from the four <WH4480> <WH702> winds, <WH7307> O breath, <WH7307> and breathe <WH5301> upon these <WH428> slain, <WH2026> that they may live. <WH2421>

So I prophesied <WH5012> as <WH834> he commanded <WH6680> me, and the breath <WH7307> came <WH935> into them, and they lived, <WH2421> and stood up <WH5975> upon <WH5921> their feet, <WH7272> an exceeding <WH3966> <WH3966> great <WH1419> army. <WH2428>

Then he said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> these <WH428> bones <WH6106> are the whole <WH3605> house <WH1004> of Israel: <WH3478> behold, <WH2009> they say, <WH559> Our bones <WH6106> are dried, <WH3001> and our hope <WH8615> is lost: <WH6> we are cut off <WH1504> for our parts.

Therefore <WH3651> prophesy <WH5012> and say <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2009> O my people, <WH5971> I <WH589> will open <WH6605> <WH853> your graves, <WH6913> and cause you to come up <WH5927> out of your graves, <WH4480> <WH6913> and bring <WH935> you into <WH413> the land <WH127> of Israel. <WH3478>

And ye shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD, <WH3068> when I have opened <WH6605> <WH853> your graves, <WH6913> O my people, <WH5971> and brought you up <WH5927> <WH853> out of your graves, <WH4480> <WH6913>

And shall put <WH5414> my spirit <WH7307> in you, and ye shall live, <WH2421> and I shall place <WH5117> you in <WH5921> your own land: <WH127> then shall ye know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> it, and performed <WH6213> it, saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>
The word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> again unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559>

Moreover, thou <WH859> son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> take <WH3947> thee one <WH259> stick, <WH6086> and write <WH3789> upon <WH5921> it, For Judah, <WH3063> and for the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> his companions: <WH2270> then take <WH3947> another <WH259> stick, <WH6086> and write <WH3789> upon <WH5921> it, For Joseph, <WH3130> the stick <WH6086> of Ephraim, <WH669> and for all <WH3605> the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> his companions: <WH2270>
And join <WH7126> them one <WH259> to <WH413> another <WH259> into one <WH259> stick; <WH6086> and they shall become <WH1961> one <WH259> in thine hand. <WH3027>

And when <WH834> the children <WH1121> of thy people <WH5971> shall speak <WH559> unto <WH413> thee, saying, <WH559> Wilt thou not <WH3808> show <WH5046> us what <WH4100> thou meanest by these? <WH428>

Say <WH1696> unto <WH413> them, Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2009> I <WH589> will take <WH3947> <WH853> the stick <WH6086> of Joseph, <WH3130> which <WH834> is in the hand <WH3027> of Ephraim, <WH669> and the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> his fellows, <WH2270> and will put <WH5414> them with <WH5921> him, even with <WH854> the stick <WH6086> of Judah, <WH3063> and make <WH6213> them one <WH259> stick, <WH6086> and they shall be <WH1961> one <WH259> in mine hand. <WH3027>
And the sticks <WH6086> whereon <WH834> <WH5921> thou writest <WH3789> shall be <WH1961> in thine hand <WH3027> before their eyes. <WH5869>

And say <WH1696> unto <WH413> them, Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2009> I <WH589> will take <WH3947> <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from among <WH4480> <WH996> the heathen, <WH1471> whither <WH834> <WH8033> they be gone, <WH1980> and will gather <WH6908> them on every side, <WH4480> <WH5439> and bring <WH935> them into <WH413> their own land: <WH127>

And I will make <WH6213> them one <WH259> nation <WH1471> in the land <WH776> upon the mountains <WH2022> of Israel; <WH3478> and one <WH259> king <WH4428> shall be <WH1961> king <WH4428> to them all: <WH3605> and they shall be <WH1961> no <WH3808> more <WH5750> two <WH8147> nations, <WH1471> neither <WH3808> shall they be divided <WH2673> into two <WH8147> kingdoms <WH4467> any more at all: <WH5750> <WH5750>

Neither <WH3808> shall they defile <WH2930> themselves any more <WH5750> with their idols, <WH1544> nor with their detestable things, <WH8251> nor with any <WH3605> of their transgressions: <WH6588> but I will save <WH3467> them out of all <WH4480> <WH3605> their dwelling places, <WH4186> wherein <WH834> they have sinned, <WH2398> and will cleanse <WH2891> them: so shall they be <WH1961> my people, <WH5971> and I <WH589> will be <WH1961> their God. <WH430>

And David <WH1732> my servant <WH5650> shall be king <WH4428> over <WH5921> them; and they all <WH3605> shall have <WH1961> one <WH259> shepherd: <WH7462> they shall also walk <WH1980> in my judgments, <WH4941> and observe <WH8104> my statutes, <WH2708> and do <WH6213> them.

And they shall dwell <WH3427> in <WH5921> the land <WH776> that <WH834> I have given <WH5414> unto Jacob <WH3290> my servant, <WH5650> wherein <WH834> your fathers <WH1> have dwelt; <WH3427> and they shall dwell <WH3427> therein, <WH5921> even they, <WH1992> and their children, <WH1121> and their children's <WH1121> children <WH1121> forever: <WH5769> and my servant <WH5650> David <WH1732> shall be their prince <WH5387> forever. <WH5769>

Moreover I will make <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> of peace <WH7965> with them; it shall be <WH1961> an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285> with <WH854> them: and I will place <WH5414> them, and multiply <WH7235> them, and will set <WH5414> my sanctuary <WH4720> in the midst <WH8432> of them forevermore. <WH5769>
My tabernacle <WH4908> also shall be <WH1961> with <WH5921> them: yea, I will be <WH1961> their God, <WH430> and they <WH1992> shall be <WH1961> my people. <WH5971>

And the heathen <WH1471> shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> do sanctify <WH6942> <WH853> Israel, <WH3478> when my sanctuary <WH4720> shall be <WH1961> in the midst <WH8432> of them forevermore. <WH5769>
